about_the_game:
World's smallest roguelike!


Deep below the damp jungle Digger Dan has discovered his richest Mine to date. However, his presence has disturbed the peace of fearsome dwellers from an era long forgotten. Can Dan maneuver his way through the treasures of the mine while keeping its inhabitants in check or has he finally met his doom?

* Destructible terrain: Create the level as you play
* Play with friends - up to 3 players
* Dynamite - to defuse deadly debacles
* How deep can you dig?
detailed_description:
World's smallest roguelike!


Deep below the damp jungle Digger Dan has discovered his richest Mine to date. However, his presence has disturbed the peace of fearsome dwellers from an era long forgotten. Can Dan maneuver his way through the treasures of the mine while keeping its inhabitants in check or has he finally met his doom?

* Destructible terrain: Create the level as you play
* Play with friends - up to 3 players
* Dynamite - to defuse deadly debacles
* How deep can you dig?
name: Digger Dan & the Mine of Doom
short_description: Dig, maneuver and blast your way to the treasures of the treacherous mine in the World's smallest Roguelike!
